title: WHY WON'T MY LEAGUE CLIENT OPEN? [HELP]
body: My league client is not opening. Well it is but as soon as the launch thingy comes up i get a message that says unexpected error. I looked on the status thing and it says the client is functional at that time. I also tried on another computer and it still does the same thing please help.

replies.body:
This is usually a result of a failure to establish a connection with the client servers. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
